description.fr_FR: Plugin permettant la gestion réseau des équipements : ping (ip, arp, port) et wake on lan
description.en_US: Plugin allowing network management of equipment: ping (ip, arp and port) and wake on lan
description.es_ES: Complemento que permite la gestión de la red del equipo: ping (ip, arp y port) y wake on lan
description.de_DE: Plugin zur Netzwerkverwaltung von Geräten: Ping (IP, Arp und Port) und Wake-On-LAN
description.pt_PT: Plugin que permite o gerenciamento de rede de equipamentos: ping (ip, arp e port) e wake on lan
